repos_data.description: News, full-text, and article metadata extraction in Python 3. Advanced docs:

Stream Framework is a Python library, which allows you to build news feed, activity streams and notification systems using Cassandra and/or Redis. The authors of Stream-Framework also provide a cloud service for feed technology:

With an inexpensive RTL-SDR USB device, LocalRadio provides a casual, home-based radio listening experience for your favorite local frequencies - FM broadcasts/free music/news/sports/weather/public safety & aviation scanner/etc.
readflow is a news-reading (or read-it-later) solution focused on versatility and simplicity.
A web server that fetches data from the News API and formats it for display in the terminal.
Basic/Classic Hacker News app, used as a Cocoa & Swift learning platform
